Fn::Sub:
{
    "widgets": [
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 9,
            "y": 0,
            "width": 15,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/EC2", "NetworkIn", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "stat": "Sum" } ],
                    [ ".", "NetworkOut", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right", "stat": "Sum" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "Network In & Out",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 3,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/EC2", "CPUUtilization", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}" ],
                    [ ".", "CPUCreditUsage", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right", "color": "#d62728" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "EC2 CPU Time & Credit Usage",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 0,
            "width": 9,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/EC2", "NetworkIn", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "id": "m1", "stat": "Sum", "period": 2592000 } ],
                    [ ".", "NetworkOut", ".", ".", { "yAxis": "right", "id": "m2", "stat": "Sum", "period": 2592000 } ]
                ],
                "view": "singleValue",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "Total traffic",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 15,
            "y": 9,
            "width": 9,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "mem_total", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "color": "#d62728" } ],
                    [ ".", "mem_used", ".", ".", { "color": "#ff7f0e" } ],
                    [ ".", "mem_available", ".", "." ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "RAM",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 9,
            "width": 15,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "mem_total", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "color": "#d62728", "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ],
                    [ ".", "mem_used", ".", ".", { "color": "#2ca02c", "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ],
                    [ ".", "mem_cached", ".", ".", { "color": "#8c564b", "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ]
                ],
                "view": "singleValue",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "RAM",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 15,
            "y": 12,
            "width": 9,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "processes_running", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "color": "#2ca02c" } ],
                    [ ".", "processes_sleeping", ".", "." ],
                    [ ".", "processes_dead", ".", ".", { "color": "#8c564b" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "Processes"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 12,
            "width": 15,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "processes_running", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "color": "#2ca02c", "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ],
                    [ ".", "processes_sleeping", ".", ".", { "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ],
                    [ ".", "processes_dead", ".", ".", { "color": "#8c564b", "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ]
                ],
                "view": "singleValue",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "Processes",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 15,
            "y": 15,
            "width": 9,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "disk_total", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "color": "#d62728" } ],
                    [ ".", "disk_used", ".", ".", { "color": "#1f77b4" } ],
                    [ ".", "disk_free", ".", "." ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "HDD"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 15,
            "width": 15,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "CWAgent", "disk_total", "AutoScalingGroupName", "${AutoScalingGroupName}", { "color": "#d62728", "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ],
                    [ ".", "disk_used", ".", ".", { "color": "#1f77b4", "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ],
                    [ ".", "disk_free", ".", ".", { "period": 2592000, "stat": "Maximum" } ]
                ],
                "view": "singleValue",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "HDD",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 3,
            "y": 6,
            "width": 21,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/ECS", "CPUUtilization", "ClusterName", "${ClusterName}", { "stat": "Average" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "ECS CPU Time",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 6,
            "width": 3,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/ECS", "CPUUtilization", "ClusterName", "${ClusterName}", { "stat": "Average", "period": 2592000 } ]
                ],
                "view": "singleValue",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "Average",
                "period": 300
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 18,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 3,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ "AWS/Logs", "IncomingLogEvents", "LogGroupName", "VPN-/var/log/ecs/ecs-agent.log", { "stat": "Sum" } ],
                    [ "...", "VPN-/var/log/messages", { "stat": "Sum" } ],
                    [ "...", "VPN-/var/log/docker", { "stat": "Sum" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "title": "Logs Intake",
                "period": 300
            }
        }
    ]
}
